In England, in the seven days to 25 February, there were 182,283 new confirmed cases (322.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 February, there were 241,627 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (59,344 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 March is 16,117,745 (28,501.7 cases per 100,000 population).
